Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui.controllers

Class GameSelectionController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui.controllers.PageController
it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui.controllers.GameSelectionController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class GameSelectionController extends PageController implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
GameSelectionController displays the scene where the client can choose which game to play on GUI

    createNewGame(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
    Method is called after the "create Game" button is clicked, it sends the message to the ServerHandler that a new game has been opened

    createNickname(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
    Accepts the input from the nicknameTextField if it is not empty and sends the chosen nickname to the ServerHandler
    void

    It's called when a game is selected and according to the type of game, it opens the game or restores an old one
    void
    errorNickname()
    This method is called when there is a problem regarding the nickname, it displays the error message next to the nicknameTextField The problems can be: "no nickname inserted": the user has tried opening a game or creating a new one without inserting a nickname first "The nickname has already been inserted": the user has tried to insert a username after having chosen one already

    • errorNickname

      public void errorNickname()
      This method is called when there is a problem regarding the nickname, it displays the error message next to the nicknameTextField The problems can be:
      • "no nickname inserted": the user has tried opening a game or creating a new one without inserting a nickname first
      • "The nickname has already been inserted": the user has tried to insert a username after having chosen one already

    • setAvailableGameMessage

      public void setAvailableGameMessage(AvailableGamesMessage availableGamesMessage)

    • setNickname

      public void setNickname(String nickname)
      After the Server has confirmed that the nickname can be chosen, a message saying "Nickname chosen!" will appear
      Parameters:
      nickname - nickname chosen by the user

    • handleErrorMessage

      Description copied from class: PageController
